art.post: It is a very amazing portrait! If you are interested, I have found Russ Breault’s – Shroud Encounter a very interesting number of videos about the Shroud and it’s verifiable truth. If you are interested the www. Is below: I find all these experiences so exciting, too!.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
